# Lists

## Unordered List

- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3
  - Nested item 3.1
  - Nested item 3.2
- Item 4

## Ordered List

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item
   1. Nested item 3.1
   2. Nested item 3.2
4. Fourth item

## Task Lists

- [ ] Unchecked task
- [x] Checked task
- [ ] Another unchecked task
  - [x] Nested checked task
  - [ ] Nested unchecked task
